SELECT prd.prd_cd, prd.prd_nm, cli.cli_nm, cd.det_nm, ord.ord_reg_date, odd.odd_cnt, NVL(odd.odd_add, '') || ' ' || NVL(odd.odd_da, '') AS ODD_ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(odd.odd_mod_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORD_REG_DATE FROM suju_order_detail odd JOIN suju_order ord ON odd.ord_id = ord.ord_id JOIN client cli ON ord.cli_id = cli.cli_id JOIN product prd ON odd.prd_cd = prd.prd_cd JOIN code_detail cd ON odd.odd_sts = cd.det_id
AND ( cli.cli_nm LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR -- 거래처명 검색 prd.prd_nm LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR -- 상품명 검색 prd.prd_cd LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' -- 상품코드도 검색에 포함 )
ORDER BY cd.det_sort asc OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT cli_nm FROM client
AND LOWER(cli_nm) LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY cli_nm OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT client_nm FROM client WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id} ORDER BY client_nm

SELECT cli_nm FROM ( SELECT cli.cli_nm, COUNT(suju.cli_id) AS order_count FROM client cli JOIN suju_order suju ON cli.cli_id = suju.cli_id GROUP BY cli.cli_nm ORDER BY order_count DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
